name: Indigo Identityware
overview: Indigo Identityware (formally Sig-Tec Corp) is a growing firm in the Identity and Access Management (IAM) industry. Indigo is not a single sign-on (SSO), but rather a Secure Identity Manager integrated with a Real-time SSO. Indigo offers software that simultaneously addresses each function of a secure IAM process. Its product, Identityware, eliminates the need to update and remember innumerable passwords and is the only real-time single sign-on in the industry. Identityware resides within the enterprise as an extension of the Windows operating system and our lightweight software-only architecture stores and manages user credentials within the client enterprise versus on a network server with 3rd party databases.

milestones.description: New Product Launch for Remote Access Using Advanced Authentication
milestones.source_text:
MINNEAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Indigo Identityware, a growing leader in the identity and access management industry, announced the release of their new product, Indigo Virtual Remote. This new product will allow users to securely access their desktops and/or networks with biometric strong authentication from a remote location.

Indigo Virtual Remote affords users the same strong authentication and enterprise single sign-on (ESSO) capabilities that they enjoy inside their enterprise, while working remotely. Using the cloud and a secure connection, Indigoâ€™s unique solution allows users secure access to their desktop and/or authorized applications from a remote location without Indigoâ€™s authentication or ESSO software loaded on the remote workstation.

Indigoâ€™s leading-edge technology will enable organizations to extend their network to employees and/or partners with Indigoâ€™s exclusive device-based strong authentication, helping ensure fast, simple and secure access remotely.

â€œWe are excited about our new product as it is unique to the market. Allowing users to access their networks or desktops remotely is becoming mandatory with the mobile economy. Hospitals are reaching out to their affiliated physician practices, users are working from home and companies are aligning with one another and requiring flexible identity security. With Indigo Virtual Remote, users can securely access their networks and utilize single sign-on without Indigoâ€™s ESSO software loaded on their remote workstation. This is revolutionary as it offers companies and users biometric identity security when they are outside of their network,â€ said Thomas Rheineck, President & CEO of Indigo Identityware.

About Indigo
Indigo Identityware is a growing leader in the identity and access management industry. Indigo distinguishes itself by offering the first and only behavioral enterprise single sign-on (ESSO) with integrated biometric strong authentication. Indigo knows exactly who you are, knows the way you work, and works the way you want it to. It increases workflow productivity while maintaining secure access to meet complete regulatory compliance. The software-only solution is cost-effective and deploys quickly with its unique, lightweight â€œsnap-inâ€ design. No expensive hardware, third party licenses, or resource-intensive implementation costs are required. No other product offers the capabilities, flexibility and value that Indigo provides to organizations of any size.
